name: Back to the Future: The Game - Episode 2. Get Tannen
name_original: Back to the Future: The Game - Episode 2. Get Tannen
description:
Back to the Future: The Game - Episode 2. Get Tannen is an adventure game developed by Telltale Games. It came out on 17-02-2011. Telltale Games published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Back to the Future: The Game - Episode 2. Get Tannen is available on PC, PlayStation 3 and macOS. You can purchase the game on PlayStation Store and Steam.
